EmailTemplate.name: Award Activated
EmailTemplate.subject: An Award for {!Award__c.ProgramName__c} for {!Award__c.LEAName__c} has been activated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User, This email is to notify you that an award for {!Award__c.ProgramName__c} for {!Award__c.LEAName__c} has been activated. Please see attached award.
Click here
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
